- eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayabuddhika brahmanagedemala jathika sandhanaya janadhipathiwaranayedi wipakshaye apekshakayata sahayogaya labadimata giwisumak assan kara thibena bawa ehi nayakayange kiyum kerumwalin anawaranaya wana bawath eya ratata heli nokala hora giwisumak bawa pahadili bawath eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye nayakayo penwa dethi.mahawali kendrayedi eeye pawathi e.ja.ni.sa janadhipathiwarana mathiwarana madhya sakachchawakadi me karunu awadharanaya kara sitiye e.ja.ni.sa mahalekam amathi susil prema jayantha, amathi patali champika saha jathika nidahas peramune sabhapathi parlimenthu manthri wimal wirawansha yana mahathwaru ya.wipakshaye apekshakawarayath demala jathika sandhanaye nayaka parlimenthu manthri aar.
